Quest.name: Start of a new journey
Quest.description: Welcome to the land of Zostedal! Through out this quest, you will learn how to travel, interract with the environment and much more!
step: Let's start by moving around : Use ZQSD to do so
Good! Now, let's interact with this bush by pressing E

Quest.name: Testing out Quest(identifier)
Quest.description: This is a unit_test to make sure the quest creation works well

Quest.name: First fight
Quest.description: This land is riddled with monsters, so you will have to fight in order to survive. This goblin should be good practice, now go and fight !
